titleStmt.title: The arriereban a sermon preached to the company of the military yarde, at St. Andrewes Church in Holborne at St. Iames his day last. By Iohn Everarde student in Diuinity, and lecturer at Saint Martins in the fields.
titleStmt.author: Everard, John, 1575?-1650?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Eagle and Childe in Brittaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: Some print show-through; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
